Netwọk India na nyocha mgbanwe ihu igwe (INCCA) bụ netwọk nke ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na India ka e guzobe iji bipụta nchọpụta ndị ọgbọ nyochara banyéré mgbanwe ihu igwe na India.
A mara ọkwa ya ọzọ n'ubochi irí abụọ na ise n'onwa Jenụwarị afọ 2012 site n'aka ónyé ọrụ nke ngalaba mgbanwe ihu igwe na Ministry of Environment mgbè nzukọ atụmatụ nke onye odeakwụkwọ (Climate) J.M

Mausker duziri, nke mekwara atụmatụ nhazi nke India National Action Plan on Climate Change (NAPCC). N'ubochi anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2010 Minista gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi nke India bụ Jairam Ramesh kwupụtara na ọ ga-akpọkọta ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị narị abụọ na iri ise sitere na ụlọ ọrụ nyocha otu narị na iri abụọ na ise nke India ma soro òtù mba ụwa rụkọọ ọrụ

A tọhapụrụ nyocha mbụ ya nke ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ n'ọnwa Mee n'ubochi irí na otu n'afọ 2010 na nyocha ihu igwe nké abụọ a ga-ebipụta na Nọvemba 2010 ga-agụnye akụkọ banyéré Himalayas, ụsọ oké osimiri nke India, ugwu Ghat ugwu na mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke India
O kwuru na ọ ga-arụ ọrụ dị ka ụdị nke India IPCC, " mana ọ gaghị emeri UN Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC).
Ramesh kwupụtakwara mbido nke Indian National Institute of Himalayan Glaciology
O kwụrụ na ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-akwanyere IPCC ùgwù, ọ bụ ọrụ ahụ na adịghị ike ya bụ na ọ naghị eme nchọpụta nke ya

Ramesh gosikwara na ajọ mbunobi ya mèrè ka ọ ghara inwe mmetụta na eziokwu mpaghara, kama ọ dabere na nchịkọta nyocha nke akụkọ ndị ọzọ, nke, dugara na "goof-ups" na oké ọhịa Amazon, glaciers Himalayan, na ice caps.
